text: Mūso guft: «Ej Parvardigori mo, ʙa Fir'avnu ʙuzurgoni qavmaş dar in çahon zinatu (qasrho, xidmatgoron, markaʙhoi foxira) amvoli ʙuzurg dodaī, to digaronro az rohi Tu gumroh kunand. Ej Parvardigori mo, amvolaşonro noʙud soz va ʙar dilhojaşon mūhr ʙineh, pas imon najorand, to on goh ki azoʙi dardovarro ʙuʙinand»
